title: Selection
fullText:
Low voltage a.c. wiring systems in a relocatable unit shall be selected in accordance with the requirements in AS/NZS 3000 and the AS/NZS 3008 series.
All wiring forming part of the electrical installation in a relocatable unit shall have a conductor cross- sectional area not less than 1.5 mm2 and not less than seven strands consisting of either â€”
(a) multi-strand insulated and sheathed cables; or
(b) flexible cords.
